attributes.action: Obtain full compensation for British citizens savings stolen by the Icelandic government instead of using them to fully compensate their own citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Obtain full compensation for British citizens' savings stolen by the Icelandic Government instead of using them to fully compensate their own citizens.
Today the Icelandic Government have put LandsBanki into administration (affecting IceSave, Heritable etc brands) and will fully compensate all their citizens with the money held. 
All British citizens have had all of their accounts frozen. The money has been effectively taken from them ie stolen.
Unlike Icelanders, British citizens will receive only 20,000 Euros (not pounds so no problem there then!) - if the Icelandic funds do not run out first.
Surely such prejudicial actions are illegal.(If not what does the EU do with all that money they take from us every year?)
For once the British Governement should actually do something useful, yes and break the habit of a lifetime, and stand up for the rights, and money, of British Citizens.
